title: How business leaders are responding to Trump's plan to cap credit card interest rates, from JPMorgan to SoFi
full_text: How business leaders are responding to Trump's plan to cap credit card interest rates, from JPMorgan to SoFi. While major banks, including JPMorgan Chase and Citi, warned that a 10% credit card cap would reduce access to credit, some CEOs applaud the plan.. Business leaders like Klarna's CEO support Trump's credit card cap proposal, while major banks and investors warn of risks.BRENDAN SMIALOWSKI/AFP via Getty Images <ul><li>Donald Trump proposes a 10%… [+4732 chars]
